name: Akos Polgar
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: In the last 2 years I'm working mainly with node.js and mongoDB. Formerly I worked a lot as a full stack dev, back then I used vanilla js, jQuery, ajax, coffeescript, node.js next to other non-related technologies. My master thesis was a research where I compared the performance of 2 Node.js apps which used different DBs. I have a hobby project where I'm using backbone.js
what_can_i_contribute: I can make a presentation for the event about my experiences. For example, one of the following topics could work for me: 'Build Node.js apps to compare the performance of different DBs' or 'Rewrite Java code to Node.js' or 'use Node.js for CPU-heavy jobs'
